lead_paragraph: They were an international odd couple with seemingly little in common when they first met, but somehow Barack Obama and Mr. Peres hit it off.

byline.contributor: Isabel Kershner contributed reporting from Jerusalem, and Majd Al Waheidi from Gaza.

headline.print_headline: Fast Friends Who Found Peace Out of Reach
headline.main: Obama and Shimon Peres: Fast Friends Who Found Peace Out of Reach

snippet: They were an international odd couple with seemingly little in common when they first met, but somehow Barack Obama and Mr. Peres hit it off....
abstract: Pres Obama's statement on death of Shimon Peres is unusually long and personal, underlining close bond two men shared despite vast difference in their ages and experiences; in some ways Peres was Israeli leader Obama wishes he had as counterpart and partner in quest for arriving at peace between Israelis and Palestinians.
